original_title: FLOSS Weekly Episode 829: This Machine Kills Vogons
original_content:
This week, Jonathan Bennett chats with Herbert Wolverson and Frantisek Borsik about LibreQOS, Bufferbloat, and Dave Tahts legacy. How did Dave figure out that Bufferbloat was the problem? And how did LibreQOS change the world? Watch to find out!


Daves blog: https://blog.cerowrt.org
http://the-edge.taht.net/
https://libreqos.io
https://x.com/LibreQoS
https://www.bufferbloat.net/projects/
https://libreqos.io/2025/04/01/in-loving-memory-of-dave/

And Daves speech, Uncle Bills Helicopter seems especially fitting. I particularly like the unintentional prediction of the Ingenuity Helicopter.

Did you know you can watch the live recording of the show right on our YouTube Channel? Have someone youd like us to interview? Let us know, or contact the guest and have them contact us! Take a look at the schedule here.

Direct Download in DRM-free MP3.
If youd rather read along, heres the transcript for this weeks episode.
